I think the problem for most people that cannot make the game run is for the resolution set in the game, sorry i don't know how to make a torrent, (NOOBB!!!) but you can ask "SOMEONE ELSE" to make a torrent for the "player folder" (inside of the COD BO2 folder) with the lowest resolution set in the game, and i can confirm that will work for everybody.
